member.name: T:PX.Objects.PR.UseDefaultValueFromSourceAttribute
member.summary: Fetches value from a "default" source or from a "else" source, depending on flag value. This attribute can fetch values from a different DAC/Table than the one where this attribute is applied.

member.name: M:PX.Objects.PR.UseDefaultValueFromSourceAttribute.#ctor(System.Type,System.Type,System.Type,System.Type[],System.Type[])
member.param: Selector field to use as the source of the "default" value if the flag value is true.
Value to use from the source
DAC field which value act as a flag indicating if the value is fetched from the source or the "else" source.
Array of fields found on the DAC in which this attribute is applied. These fields will be used in the "Where" clause of the "Else" statement
Array of fields found on the foreign table that will match those defined in . Matching keys need to be on the same array index.
member.example:
[UseDefaultValueFromSource(typeof(PREmployee.employeeClassID), typeof(PREmployeeClass.unionID), typeof(PREmployee.unionUseDflt), new[] { typeof(PREmployee.bAccountID) }, new[] { typeof(EPEmployee.bAccountID) }, Required = RequiredMode.Never)]
will lead to SQL similar to this : SELECT CASE WHEN [PREmployee].[unionUseDflt] = 1 THEN (SELECT [PREmployeeClassExt].[UnionID] FROM [PREmployeeClass] [PREmployeeClassExt] WHERE [PREmployeeClassExt].[employeeClassID] = [PREmployee].[employeeClassID]) ELSE (SELECT [EPEmployee].[UnionID] FROM [EPEmployee] [EPEmployee] WHERE [EPEmployee].[bAccountID] = [PREmployee].[bAccountID]) END

member.name: M:PX.Objects.PR.UseDefaultValueFromSourceAttribute.PrePersist(PX.Data.PXGraph)
member.summary: If the "Use Default" flag is true, prevent overwrite of value already in database.

member.name: M:PX.Objects.PR.PRAufGenerationEngine.IsApplicableAatrixPredefinedField(PX.Objects.PR.PRTaxCodeAttribute)
member.summary: Even though the generic 'IsApplicableAatrixPredefinedField' method (above) is suitable for the 'PRTaxCodeAttribute' type, this method is needed because the unbound 'PRTaxCodeAttribute.State' field has the 'TaxAttributeStateAttribute' attribute with the 'FieldSelecting' handler which is supposed to initialize the value of the 'PRTaxCodeAttribute.State' field. However, the 'TaxAttributeStateAttribute.FieldSelecting' handler is not triggered when the 'PRTaxCodeAttribute' DAC is used in the context of the 'PRAufGenerationEngine.EmployeeTaxAttributes' view, since it is a joined DAC in the view. That is why it is necessary to retrieve the Tax State by the 'PRTaxCodeAttribute.TaxID' field.

member.name: M:PX.Objects.PR.PRUniqueDeductionCodeSelector.SubstituteKeyFieldUpdating(PX.Data.PXCache,PX.Data.PXFieldUpdatingEventArgs)
member.summary: Overrides PXSelectorAttribute validation that checks if field value exists in the system. Instead of using GetRecords() to validate possible values, this is checking from cache. It also validates that inserted lines doesn't have same CodeID as an existing line.
member.remark: A cache.Locate(e.Row) that returns a row with CodeID == null means we are inserting a new line, otherwise an existing line is being updated. Validation should only occurs when inserting new lines.

member.name: M:PX.Objects.PR.PTOHelper.GetPTOHistoryForPaymentPTOBank(PX.Data.PXGraph,System.DateTime,System.Int32,PX.Objects.PR.PREmployeePTOBank,System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Calculate accumulated, used and available PTO amounts at specified date, for an employee and a bank. PTO Adjustments amounts from the previous PTO cycle will be carried over to thhe current PTO cycle. Make sure you pass the right pto bank for your needs, either the PTO bank itself, the Class bank or the Employee Bank.
